name: handoff-context-prompt
description: Prompt template injected when a session is a continuation from a previous session (handoff)
promptTemplate:
## Handoff Context (CRITICAL - READ THIS FIRST)
This session is a continuation from a previous session. 

**⚠️ IMPORTANT: You MUST use the EXACT file paths listed below. Do NOT make up or invent file names.**

{{handoffText}}
